data.title: Structural Engineer_Duong Quoc Huan_2015
data.meta_description: Structural Engineer_Duong Quoc Huan_2015 - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. PROFESSIONAL RESUME Rev. Date Checked Approved “Confidentiality Class A – Property of Technip. VST0063 01/08/12 Unauthorized copying and disclosure are strictly prohibited.” NAME : DUONG QUOC HUAN NATIONALITY : Vietnamese YEAR OF BIRTH : 1988 TERTIARY EDUCATION : National University of Civil Engineering / Institute of Construction for Offshore Engineering, Year of graduate 2011 CAREER SUMMARY I have been working at Technip since August 2010, in structural engineering for offshore oil and gas industry carrying out various projects and task from feasibility study, concept selection, FEED, detailed design both greenfield and brownfield. Independently able to perform design of deep water fixed offshore platform (jacket and topsides) both in-service analyses such as: In-place, dynamic, deterministic and spectral fatigue, load-out, lifting, transportation, on-bottom stability, pile drivability analysis, develops miscellaneous calculation, MTO, WCR, drawing and vendor data review and check by SACS, SESAM, GRLWEAP and USFOS. I was seconding to Technip France - Abu Dhabi (UAE) since November 2014 to do vendor data review and check, secondary design, and in 2012, I was seconded to Technip Malaysia two times, joined Ichthys FPSO project to do in-place and lifting analysis for module 08B (misc process module) using SACS program. After almost 5 years working at Technip, I looking for new challenging and make more experience for my career. EMPLOYMENT SUMMARY Period Company Name Position Held 11/2014 – present Technip France - Abu Dhabi Offshore Structural Engineer 08/2010 – 10/2014 Technip Vietnam Offshore Structural Engineer

2. DUONG QUOC HUAN Page 2 of 6 “Confidentiality Class A – Property of Technip. Unauthorized copying and disclosure are strictly prohibited.” WORKING EXPERIENCE 11/2014 – Present Client : Abu Dhabi Marine Operating Company (ADMA-OPCO) Project title : Um Lulu project Project size : 8 Platform, bridges and intermediate support structures Project position : Offshore Structural Engineer Project brief description : EPC work for Umm Lulu phase II full field development project package 2 – Umm lulu super complex and subsea composite power cables. Job description : - Perform to do Topsides Secondary design for Gas Treatment Platform (Like Equipment support, bridge crane, access platform...) - Perform to do Vendor Data review 3/2014 – 10/2014 Client : Total E&P Borneo B.V Project title : Maharaja Lela South Project Project size : One Topsides of Wellhead Platform Project position : Offshore Structural Engineer and Coordinator Project brief description : Green Field: Detail Design services for one (01) unmanned WHP (topsides) for Maharaja Lela Jamalulalam (MLJ) Field with 63m water depth and 12 wells Job description : - Perform to do Topsides Inplace Analysis - Perform to do Topsides Lifting Analysis - Perform to do Miscellaneous Report (Monorail, Foldable connection Calculation) - Perform to check drawing - Perform to coordinator with another Dipcipline about Weight, Vendor data, Equipment layout 1/2014 – 3/2014 Client : PETRONAS Carigali Sdn. Bhd. Project title : Front End Engineering Design (FEED) For Sepat Gas Development Project size : Two (02) Wellhead Platform Project position : Offshore Structural Engineer Project brief description : Green Field: FEED services for two (02) WHP (topsides and substructure) for Sepat Gas Development Project with 64m water depth. Job description : - Perform to help to do Boat Impact analysis using USFOS - Perform to check drawing and model in SACS - Perform non steel MTO 5/2013 – 1/2014 Client : Cuu Long Joint Operating Company Project title : Su Tu Nau Field Development Provision Detailed Engineering Design and Procurement Support Project size : Two (02) Wellhead Platform and Re-Assessment 2 Wellhead Platform Project position : Offshore Structural Engineer and Coordinator

3. DUONG QUOC HUAN Page 3 of 6 “Confidentiality Class A – Property of Technip. Unauthorized copying and disclosure are strictly prohibited.” Project brief description : Green Field: Detail Design services for two (02) unmanned WHP (topsides) for Su Tu Nau Field with 60m water depth and re- assessment 2 wellhead platform when put new riser Job description : - Perform to deverlop model Topsides Su Tu Nau - South Wellhead Platform - Perform to check drawing and make it corresponding with analysis for Topsides Su Tu Nau - South Wellhead Platform - Perform In-place Analysis for Topsides Su Tu Nau South Wellhead Platform - Perform Lifting Analysis for Topsides Su Tu Nau North Wellhead Platform - Perform In-place, Load-out, Lifting, Up-Ending, Fatigue Analysis for Flare Boom Su Tu Nau South Wellhead Platform - Perform to Miscellaneous Report (Ring Connection, Joint Stiffener calculation, Equipment Support) - Perform to review and check vendor data for Equipment 10/2012 – 5/2013 Client : PETRONAS Carigali Sdn. Bhd. Project title : Provision of FEED and EPCIC for SK316 Gas Development Project Project size : Design two Wellhead Platforms Project position : Offshore Structural Engineer and Coordinator Project brief description : Green Field: FEED services for two WHP (topsides and substructure) for SK316 Gas Development Project with 64m water depth. Job description : - Perform to study and deverlop model Topsides and Subtructure for NC3 Wellhead Platform - Perform In-place Analysis for Topsides NC3 Wellhead Platform - Coordinator Structural Engineer and Structural Designer to do Topsides and Substructure NC3 Wellhead Platform - Perform Material Take-off Report for Topsides and Substructure NC3 Wellhead Platform - Perform Weight Control Report for Topsides and Subtructure NC3 Wellhead Platform - Coordinator Structural Engineer and Structural Designer to do Topsides and Substructure NC3 Wellhead Platform - Perform Material Take-off for Topsides and Substructure NC3 Wellhead Platform - Perform to Miscellaneous Report (Ring Connection calculation only) 08/2012 – 10/2012 Client : INPEX Browse, Ltd. Project title : ICHTHYS Floating, Production, Storage and Offloading Unit - Detail design Project size : FPSO Project Project position : Offshore Structural Engineer in Technip Malaysia Project brief description : Green Field: Ichthys FPSO is a non-propelled, ship shaped, turret moored, Floating Production Offloading Storage Unit (FPSO). It has a Lpp of 320m and is 58.8m across the beam and is designed for operations offshore Western Australia at permit area WA-285-P, Ichthys Field Job description : - Perform In-place Analysis for Primary beams of module 08B (Misc Process) - Perform Lifting Analysis for Primary beams of module 08B (Misc Process) - Check drawing corressponding with analysis for Primary beams of module 08B (Misc Process) 06/2012 Client : TNK VIETNAM B.V

4. DUONG QUOC HUAN Page 4 of 6 “Confidentiality Class A – Property of Technip. Unauthorized copying and disclosure are strictly prohibited.” – 08/2012 Project title : Lan Tay Produced Water Handling Expansion Project – FEED and Detailed Design Project size : Project position : Offshore Structural Engineer Project brief description : Brown Field: Design and Assessment of Lan Tay topsides due to the additional loads of De-gasser vessel and a hydro-cyclone package. Job description : - Verify Documents received from TNK – Scope of Work and COMPANY requirements - Perform site visit List, site visit Lan Tay platform. - Perform Structural Assessment of Lan Tay topside due to the additional loads of a De- gasser vessel and a hydro-cyclone package, including Report for Company using Sacs program and manual calculation prepared using spread sheets. - Perform MTO report 04/2012 – 06/2012 Client : PETRONAS Carigali Overseas Sdn Bhd (PCOSB) Project title : Provision of conceptual and feed services for Thai Binh development project, Block 102 & 106 Project size : One (01) Wellhead Platform Project position : Offshore Structural Engineer Project brief description : Green Field: Conceptual and FEED Engineering services for one (01) substructure WHP for Thai Binh project with a water depth of 25-30 m. Job description : - Perform Dynamic Analysis - Perform Spectral Fatigue Analysis - Perform Pile Drivability Analysis - Perform Conductor Drivability Analysis 10/2011 – 04/2012 Client : Lam Son JOC Project title : Thang Long - Dong Do Detail Design Project size : Two (2) Wellhead Platform Project position : Offshore Structural Engineer and Coordinator Project brief description : Green Field: Detail Engineering services for two WHP (topsides and substructure) for Thang Long - Dong Do project with 64m water depth. Job description : - Review on Reports and Drawings received from FEED prepare the Report - Perform spreadsheets for Miscellaneous Report as Stabbing Guide, Drop Object, Padeye, Hatch Cover, Boom Rest. - Prepare Dong Do Substructure on-Bottom Stability Analysis - Perform Dong Do Topsides In-place Analysis and prepare the Report. - Perform Dong Do Topsides Lifting Analysis and prepare the Report. - Perform Dong Do Topsides Seismic Analysis and prepare the Report. - Perform Dong Do Topsides Miscellaneous and prepare the Report. - Prepare Dong Do Topsides - Material Take Off Report. 02/2011 – 09/2011 Client : Vietsov Pertro Project title : Thien Ung (TU) FDP FEED Project size : One (1) Fixed Drilling Platform Project position : Junior Offshore Structural Engineer

5. DUONG QUOC HUAN Page 5 of 6 “Confidentiality Class A – Property of Technip. Unauthorized copying and disclosure are strictly prohibited.” Project brief description : Green Field: FEED Engineering services for one (01) FDP (topsides and substructure) for Thien Ung project with 125m water depth. Job description : - Perform 3D modelling of TU Fixed Drilling Platform (FDP) Topsides using Smart Marine 3D - Preparing and developing TU FDP Topside modelling using GENIE (SESAM) - Perform TU FDP Topsides In- Place Analysis using GENIE (SESAM) - Perform TU FDP FDP Topsides Load-Out Analysis using GENIE (SESAM) - Perform TU FDP FDP Topsides Lifting Analysis using GENIE (SESAM) - Perform TU FDP FDP Topsides Miscellaneous Report such as Boom rest, Stringer Beam, Plate, Drop Object, Padeye... - Perform TU FDP Topsides Weight Control Report - Perform TU FDP Topsides - Material Take Off Report 08/2010 – 01/2011 Name of company : Technip Vietnam Co. Ltd Project title : Extend frame for KNOC Platform to put HP Cooler Project size : One (1) External Deck Project position : Internship and perform the graduation project Project brief description : Brown Field: Design the extend frame for KNOC Platform to put HP Cooler Job description : - Perform In- Place Analysis using Sacs - Perform Lifting Analysis using Sacs - Perform Transportation Analysis using Sacs - Site survey at fabrication yard
